sources.title: Bela Lugosi | The Ape Man 1943 | Horror, Sci-Fi | Colorized Movie | Subtitles
sources.description:
Dr. James Brewster (Bela Lugosi) whose experiments with a serum intended to cure polio lead to a horrifying transformation, turning him into an ape-like creature. As he grapples with his monstrous condition, Brewster must find a way to reverse the effects and clear his name of a murder.

Original title: The Ape Man 1943 

B&W version https://youtu.be/ONkGcI0pODU

Director: William Beaudine
Writers: Karl Brown, Barney A. Sarecky
Stars: Bela Lugosi, Louise Currie, Wallace Ford
Genres: Drama, Horror, Sci-Fi

This film has English & Italian audio options. Go to video settings ‚öôÔ∏è to modify your audio/subtitle options.
